level.heading: Removal or injury of property forbidden.
level.text: It is forbidden to step or climb upon, remove, or in any way injure any statue, seat, wall, fountain, or other erection or architectural feature, or any tree, shrub, plant, or turf in said United States Capitol Grounds.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 10-503.18.
